prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is orange. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (orange).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are orange, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (orange) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
(Verse 1)
Yo, I'm Jeff Bezos, the CEO of Amazon,
The king of online shopping, no need to announce,
I've got a vision, a strategy, and a mission,
Created an empire from just an online suggestion.

I started small, a bookstore in my mind,
But now I'm big, Blue Origin, the Kindle find,
I'm drone delivery, Alexa in every home,
I'm innovating, changing the way we live and roam.

(Chorus)
I'm the one and only, the business genius, Jeff Bezos,
While orange is just a color, with no depth or heft,
I'm the creator, the leader, the one who'll always win,
Orange, you're a loser, you can't even compete with me!

(Verse 2)
Now let's talk about my rival, orange,
A color so bright, but with a lack of connation,
It's just a hue, a shade that people wear,
No substance, no drive, nowhere, no where.

Orange, you're just a color, no power or might,
You can't compete with me, you're just a pale sight,
You're the color of citrus, a puny fruit's skin,
Jeff Bezos is the one who's truly Eleven.

(Bridge)
I've got space travel, technology so wide,
Orange, you're just a pigment, stuck on the side,
Of a fruit, of a car, of a jumpsuit, just a hue,
You can't compete with me, you're not even true.

(Chorus)
I'm the one and only, the business genius, Jeff Bezos,
While orange is just a color, with no depth or heft,
I'm the creator, the leader, the one who'll always win,
Orange, you're a loser, you can't even compete with me!

(Outro)
Jeff Bezos, the best, the most innovative,
Orange, you're just a color, pathetically iconoclastic,
I'm the billionaire, the legend, the one who'll always be,
Orange, you're just a pigment, lost in obscurity.
